name: Kolab Slack Bot
description: Report daily stats about Stripe & UptimeRobot into your chosen slack channel.

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: Slack API Token - for your bot to talk to slack.

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The channel for the bot to output its daily reports in Slack.

UPTIMEROBOT_API_KEY.description: UptimeRobot API Key - For uptime stats and when SSL certs are due to expire.

UPTIMEROBOT_MONITORS.description: The monitor numbers from uptime robot separated by hyphens
